short_summary: Supply of audiovisual services for the 2023 Global Environment Facility (GEF) Seventh Assembly.
description: Supply of audiovisual services for the 2023 Global Environment Facility (GEF) Seventh Assembly to be held at the Vancouver Conference Centre August 21-27, 2023 in Vancouver, British Columbia.
full_summary:
**Tender Title:** 
Global Environment Facility (GEF) Assembly - Audiovisual Services and Staffing

**Tender Reference Number:** cb-4861-38898432 | Solicitation Number: 2023-7449056

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) | Tender Status: Expired

**Procurement Overview:**

The Global Environment Facility (GEF) Seventh Assembly will be held at the Vancouver Conference Centre (August 21-27, 2023). This procurement is seeking proposals for audiovisual services to support the Assembly, including:
- Audio-visual equipment rental and setup
- Technical staff to operate and coordinate the technical aspects of the Assembly

**Procurement Details:**

* **Tender Closing Date:** [May 29, 2023, 2:00 PM (ET)](http://timeanddate.com/worldclock/converter.html?iso=20230529T140000&p1=166&c66)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 1, 2023 | Expected Contract End Date: August 28, 2023
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Quotes will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating for technical merit and price.

**Eligibility and Selection Criteria:**

* Bidders must submit a tender for the provision of audio-visual services and staffing for the GEF Seventh Assembly.
* Tenderers must demonstrate experience providing audio-visual services for large international events.

**Additional Requirements:**

* Tenderers must provide supporting documentation, including:
	- Company profile and history
	- Technical and operational capabilities
	- Financial resources and funding

**Contracting Entity:**

* Global Affairs Canada
* Lester B. Pearson Building, 125 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0G2

**Contact Information:**

* Micheline Lafontaine
* Email: [Micheline.lafontaine@international.gc.ca](mailto:Micheline.lafontaine@international.gc.ca)
